TEXT.English: Hello! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I expect years of good relations between the [OUR_EMPIRE] and the [CT_EMPIRE]!
TEXT.Chinese: Hello! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I expect years of good relations between the [OUR_EMPIRE] and the [CT_EMPIRE]!

TEXT.English: Welcome to [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]! Are you looking for peace or demand war?
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎来到[OUR_CIV_SHORT]，[CT_NAME]。我是[OUR_NAME]！你是否正在寻找和平或需求战争?

TEXT.English: Welcome to this beautiful land, [CT_NAME]. Take a look around and see the might of the [OUR_EMPIRE]!
TEXT.Chinese: 欢迎来到这片美丽的土地，[CT_NAME]。Take a look around and see the might of the [OUR_EMPIRE]!

TEXT.English: Hello, I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the [OUR_EMPIRE]! I hope you come in peace... it would be so unfortunate if we had to destroy you!
TEXT.Chinese: 你好，我是[OUR_NAME]，[OUR_EMPIRE]的统治者！I hope you come in peace... it would be so unfortunate if we had to destroy you!

TEXT.English: I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. We can be friends or enemies.
TEXT.Chinese: I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people. We can be friends or enemies.

TEXT.English: Welcome to the desert. I am Abu Yusuf Yagub. We can be friends or enemies.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to the desert. I am Abu Yusuf Yagub. We can be friends or enemies.

TEXT.English: While other nations go to war, we lucky Austria, we wed.
TEXT.Chinese: While other nations go to war, we lucky Austria, we wed.

TEXT.English: Welcome to my court. Grab a drink and look around. If we are friends, perhaps you will reign as long as I will.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to my court. Grab a drink and look around. If we are friends, perhaps you will reign as long as I will.

TEXT.English: Well met friend. What shall we conquer today?
TEXT.Chinese: Well met friend. What shall we conquer today?

TEXT.English: I am Maximilian. My titles would take all day. Let's have a good old joust instead.
TEXT.Chinese: I am Maximilian. My titles would take all day. Let's have a good old joust instead.

TEXT.English: By the favour shown to me by heaven, I have led the Bulgarian nation to a height of glory. Tell me about yourself.
TEXT.Chinese: By the favour shown to me by heaven, I have led the Bulgarian nation to a height of glory. Tell me about yourself.

TEXT.English: Ah, fantastic, a new enemy to crush! Perhaps you have heard of me, Philip the Bold? No... well, you shall.
TEXT.Chinese: Ah, fantastic, a new enemy to crush! Perhaps you have heard of me, Philip the Bold? No... well, you shall.

TEXT.English: I have now reigned above fifty years in victory or peace; beloved by my subjects, dreaded by my enemies, and respected by my allies. O man! place not thy confidence in this present world!
TEXT.Chinese: I have now reigned above fifty years in victory or peace; beloved by my subjects, dreaded by my enemies, and respected by my allies. O man! place not thy confidence in this present world!

TEXT.English: I am Simone Boccanegra, first Doge of Genoa. You don't sing by any chance, do you?
TEXT.Chinese: I am Simone Boccanegra, first Doge of Genoa. You don't sing by any chance, do you?

TEXT.English: I can see what you're up to, you know.
TEXT.Chinese: I can see what you're up to, you know.

TEXT.English: Greetings, pan! I, [OUR_NAME], Ataman of the Zaporozhian army! What are you looking for on the green steppes of Ukraine?
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, pan! I, [OUR_NAME], Ataman of the Zaporozhian army! What are you looking for on the green steppes of Ukraine?

TEXT.English: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti. Welcome, my child.
TEXT.Chinese: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti. Welcome, my child.

TEXT.English: Welcome to my dominions, [CT_NAME]. My empire is vast, as is my knowlege. Would you agree to peaceful terms, or shall I bring forth my armies against you, in the name of God?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to my dominions, [CT_NAME]. My empire is vast, as is my knowlege. Would you agree to peaceful terms, or shall I bring forth my armies against you, in the name of God?

TEXT.English: It is impiety, and almost blasphemy to presume to know the will of God. It comes from the sin of pride. Even kings, [CT_NAME], must submit to being used by God's will without knowing what it is. They must never seek to use it.
TEXT.Chinese: It is impiety, and almost blasphemy to presume to know the will of God. It comes from the sin of pride. Even kings, [CT_NAME], must submit to being used by God's will without knowing what it is. They must never seek to use it.

TEXT.English: Hello! I am [OUR_NAME], king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I hope you come with peace... it would be so unfortunate if we had to destroy you!
TEXT.Chinese: Hello! I am [OUR_NAME], king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I hope you come with peace... it would be so unfortunate if we had to destroy you!

TEXT.English: O how small a portion of earth will hold us when we are dead, who ambitiously seek after the whole world while we are living.
TEXT.Chinese: O how small a portion of earth will hold us when we are dead, who ambitiously seek after the whole world while we are living.

TEXT.English: Speak of the devil and the devil appears... begone, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: Speak of the devil and the devil appears... begone, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: Peace? Not impossible, but right now very improbable, [CT_NAME]. You still need to be taught a lesson!
TEXT.Chinese: Peace? Not impossible, but right now very improbable, [CT_NAME]. You still need to be taught a lesson!

TEXT.English: Good, good, [CT_NAME], I am glad you have come. Let us discuss our visions of glorious imperialism and colonization of the world!
TEXT.Chinese: Good, good, [CT_NAME], I am glad you have come. Let us discuss our visions of glorious imperialism and colonization of the world!

TEXT.English: Time is money, [CT_NAME], and you're apparently wasting my time.
TEXT.Chinese: Time is money, [CT_NAME], and you're apparently wasting my time.

TEXT.English: The humble realm of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] have but one small request. I am quite sure you can handle it.
TEXT.Chinese: The humble realm of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] have but one small request. I am quite sure you can handle it.

TEXT.English: In times of need, kindness can be very valuable.
TEXT.Chinese: In times of need, kindness can be very valuable.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], it has been brought to my attention that you have something the [OUR_EMPIRE] needs. I am sure you are willing to help us here, or else I will send my armada - and mark my words, it will not fail this time!
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME], it has been brought to my attention that you have something the [OUR_EMPIRE] needs. I am sure you are willing to help us here, or else I will send my armada - and mark my words, it will not fail this time!

TEXT.English: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.
TEXT.Chinese: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.

TEXT.English: Bonjour, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], the Messenger of God. Choose your words carefully, for it is said that people are hanged sometimes for speaking the truth.
TEXT.Chinese: Bonjour, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], the Messenger of God. Choose your words carefully, for it is said that people are hanged sometimes for speaking the truth.

TEXT.English: I'm talking to the Lord right now. Don't interrupt me!
TEXT.Chinese: I'm talking to the Lord right now. Don't interrupt me!

TEXT.English: You'll have to burn me at the stake first.
TEXT.Chinese: You'll have to burn me at the stake first.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], I had a vision that you'd arrive here! Come and make yourself comfortable.
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME], I had a vision that you'd arrive here! Come and make yourself comfortable.

TEXT.English: Come out, [CT_NAME], so I can send you to hell!
TEXT.Chinese: Come out, [CT_NAME], so I can send you to hell!

TEXT.English: God told me that you should hand this over. That is all.
TEXT.Chinese: God told me that you should hand this over. That is all.

TEXT.English: I know nothing about the love or hatred that God has for you, [CT_NAME], but I do know that you will all die if you don't hand this over to [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: I know nothing about the love or hatred that God has for you, [CT_NAME], but I do know that you will all die if you don't hand this over to [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: I had a vision of the [CT_EMPIRE] going up in flames. Care to assure me that I was just crazy?
TEXT.Chinese: I had a vision of the [CT_EMPIRE] going up in flames. Care to assure me that I was just crazy?

TEXT.English: Greetings from [OUR_NAME] the Great, king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I expect years of good relations between the [OUR_EMPIRE] and the [CT_EMPIRE]!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings from [OUR_NAME] the Great, king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! I expect years of good relations between the [OUR_EMPIRE] and the [CT_EMPIRE]!

TEXT.English: I am [OUR_NAME]. Will you help me make [OUR_CIV_SHORT] great?
TEXT.Chinese: I am [OUR_NAME]. Will you help me make [OUR_CIV_SHORT] great?

TEXT.English: Go away if you don't want me to get my sword!
TEXT.Chinese: Go away if you don't want me to get my sword!

TEXT.English: You do not deserve peace with [OUR_NAME] the Great!
TEXT.Chinese: You do not deserve peace with [OUR_NAME] the Great!

TEXT.English: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am so happy to see you here! Have you already seen the new castle I built?
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings, [CT_NAME]! I am so happy to see you here! Have you already seen the new castle I built?

TEXT.English: Say what you have to say and try to give me a reason to listen to you!
TEXT.Chinese: Say what you have to say and try to give me a reason to listen to you!

TEXT.English: Any chance [OUR_CIV_SHORT] can get help from [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: Any chance [OUR_CIV_SHORT] can get help from [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Help [OUR_CIV_SHORT] today, so it won't destroy you tomorrow!
TEXT.Chinese: Help [OUR_CIV_SHORT] today, so it won't destroy you tomorrow!

TEXT.English: Give us this or prepare for war with the [OUR_EMPIRE]!
TEXT.Chinese: Give us this or prepare for war with the [OUR_EMPIRE]!

TEXT.English: Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Remember: they don't call me the "Lion of Lechistan" for no reason!
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings! I am [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. Remember: they don't call me the "Lion of Lechistan" for no reason!

TEXT.English: I am [OUR_NAME], King of Poland and Grand Duke of Lithuania by the grace of God. You may kiss my hand.
TEXT.Chinese: I am [OUR_NAME], King of Poland and Grand Duke of Lithuania by the grace of God. You may kiss my hand.

TEXT.English: I do not wish to talk. You may send me a letter if you really want to.
TEXT.Chinese: I do not wish to talk. You may send me a letter if you really want to.

TEXT.English: It is not possible to stop my hussars if they have already started charging.
TEXT.Chinese: It is not possible to stop my hussars if they have already started charging.

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], my dear friend! What do you think about founding the Holy League?
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME], my dear friend! What do you think about founding the Holy League?

TEXT.English: Have you ever heard the roar of a hundred charging knights? My hussars, be ready!
TEXT.Chinese: Have you ever heard the roar of a hundred charging knights? My hussars, be ready!

TEXT.English: This will be the test of our friendship, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: This will be the test of our friendship, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: We need to help each other, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: We need to help each other, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Do you really want me to start another crusade? My beloved Marysienka won't be happy.
TEXT.Chinese: Do you really want me to start another crusade? My beloved Marysienka won't be happy.

TEXT.English: To quote my patron saint: Nothing in this inconstant life can weaken my resolve to serve God.
TEXT.Chinese: To quote my patron saint: Nothing in this inconstant life can weaken my resolve to serve God.

TEXT.English: Hello, I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the [OUR_EMPIRE]! Take a look around you and see the might of my empire!
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the [OUR_EMPIRE]! Take a look around you and see the might of my empire!

TEXT.English: I do not speak to those who are disloyal to me! Go away I said!
TEXT.Chinese: I do not speak to those who are disloyal to me! Go away I said!

TEXT.English: So, you want peace? No, you'll have to beat me first! Good luck, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: So, you want peace? No, you'll have to beat me first! Good luck, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: Oh, hello, [CT_NAME]! Welcome again to my glorious lands! Do you have any daughters my sons can marry?
TEXT.Chinese: Oh, hello, [CT_NAME]! Welcome again to my glorious lands! Do you have any daughters my sons can marry?

TEXT.English: Speak faster, [CT_NAME], I have no time for the likes of you. My laws won't write themselves, you know!
TEXT.Chinese: Speak faster, [CT_NAME], I have no time for the likes of you. My laws won't write themselves, you know!

TEXT.English: As a patron of learning, I'd like some help from you to educate my society. Do we have a deal?
TEXT.Chinese: As a patron of learning, I'd like some help from you to educate my society. Do we have a deal?

TEXT.English: If you don't want to make me mad I suggest you give me this. You don't want to spoil our relations, do you?
TEXT.Chinese: If you don't want to make me mad I suggest you give me this. You don't want to spoil our relations, do you?

TEXT.English: I suggest you give us this if you don't want to spend the rest of your life imprisoned like my brother...
TEXT.Chinese: I suggest you give us this if you don't want to spend the rest of your life imprisoned like my brother...

TEXT.English: I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I am the great [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, inhabitants of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].
TEXT.Chinese: I am honored to meet you, [CT_NAME]. I am the great [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] people, inhabitants of [OUR_CIV_SHORT].

TEXT.English: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], czar of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Do you want to discover why they call me the Terrible?
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME], czar of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Do you want to discover why they call me the Terrible?

TEXT.English: Two Romes have fallen but the third exists, and there will not be a fourth.
TEXT.Chinese: Two Romes have fallen but the third exists, and there will not be a fourth.

TEXT.English: No! I absolutely refuse to speak with you!
TEXT.Chinese: No! I absolutely refuse to speak with you!

TEXT.English: You stinky dog! Go away!
TEXT.Chinese: You stinky dog! Go away!

TEXT.English: This war won't end until you and your entire army will be sitting in my court... impaled on poles!
TEXT.Chinese: This war won't end until you and your entire army will be sitting in my court... impaled on poles!

TEXT.English: Certainly not. The war will continue until I decide it is time to resume peace, or you are conquered!
TEXT.Chinese: Certainly not. The war will continue until I decide it is time to resume peace, or you are conquered!

TEXT.English: Oh, [CT_NAME]! Wait a second... I'll finish torturing this basurman and I'll be with you!
TEXT.Chinese: Oh, [CT_NAME]! Wait a second... I'll finish torturing this basurman and I'll be with you!

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome, [CT_NAME]. I can always spare a few moments to converse with friends and allies.

TEXT.English: Right on time, [CT_NAME]! I have prepared a pole just for you!
TEXT.Chinese: Right on time, [CT_NAME]! I have prepared a pole just for you!

TEXT.English: Can you spare us this, [CT_NAME]? I would be extremely grateful for your assistance.
TEXT.Chinese: Can you spare us this, [CT_NAME]? I would be extremely grateful for your assistance.

TEXT.English: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] could use this, you know?
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] could use this, you know?

TEXT.English: It would be diplomatically expedient to give us what we want, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: It would be diplomatically expedient to give us what we want, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Peace is the biggest struggle. Time to pay up, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: Peace is the biggest struggle. Time to pay up, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: Give me this or be impaled!
TEXT.Chinese: Give me this or be impaled!

TEXT.English: Pay your debts, dog!
TEXT.Chinese: Pay your debts, dog!

TEXT.English: Greetings from the great king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [OUR_NAME]! Are you looking for peace and an alliance with us or demand war?
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings from the great king of [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [OUR_NAME]! Are you looking for peace and an alliance with us or demand war?

TEXT.English: The Lord God is my armor!
TEXT.Chinese: The Lord God is my armor!

TEXT.English: I don't speak to traitors!
TEXT.Chinese: I don't speak to traitors!

TEXT.English: Peace, [CT_NAME]?! I'm not done with you yet!
TEXT.Chinese: Peace, [CT_NAME]?! I'm not done with you yet!

TEXT.English: Welcome again! I will show you how the restoration of my castle is going.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome again! I will show you how the restoration of my castle is going.

TEXT.English: Well, if it isn't [CT_NAME]... What is that you want from the great [OUR_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: Well, if it isn't [CT_NAME]... What is that you want from the great [OUR_NAME]?

TEXT.English: Help [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME], and we will be grateful!
TEXT.Chinese: Help [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME], and we will be grateful!

TEXT.English: So, any chance you will share the following with your allies, the [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1]?
TEXT.Chinese: So, any chance you will share the following with your allies, the [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1]?

TEXT.English: [OUR_NAME] demands this! Do not test his patience!
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_NAME] demands this! Do not test his patience!

TEXT.English: I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! Welcome to my kingdom, [CT_NAME]. It is through divine will that I am here before you; to what do YOU owe your presence before me?
TEXT.Chinese: I am [OUR_NAME] of [OUR_CIV_SHORT]! Welcome to my kingdom, [CT_NAME]. It is through divine will that I am here before you; to what do YOU owe your presence before me?

TEXT.English: If you associate with wise men, you will become wise; if you deal with fools, you will become one of them. So, [CT_NAME], are you that wise that you come in peace?
TEXT.Chinese: If you associate with wise men, you will become wise; if you deal with fools, you will become one of them. So, [CT_NAME], are you that wise that you come in peace?

TEXT.English: Be strong lest prosperity lifts you up too much or adversity cast you down. Be humble in this life that God may raise you up in the next.
TEXT.Chinese: Be strong lest prosperity lifts you up too much or adversity cast you down. Be humble in this life that God may raise you up in the next.

TEXT.English: Insubordination is a pestilence in the kingdom. I have nothing to say to you.
TEXT.Chinese: Insubordination is a pestilence in the kingdom. I have nothing to say to you.

TEXT.English: Don't come back until you've converted, you pagan son of a badger!
TEXT.Chinese: Don't come back until you've converted, you pagan son of a badger!

TEXT.English: A patient king reigns, but an impatient king is a tyrant. We can not have peace with tyrants.
TEXT.Chinese: A patient king reigns, but an impatient king is a tyrant. We can not have peace with tyrants.

TEXT.English: Talk to the Holy Right, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: Talk to the Holy Right, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: Welcome back to my palace, [CT_NAME]! I thank God that I can receive an honorable ruler like you in my kingdom.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome back to my palace, [CT_NAME]! I thank God that I can receive an honorable ruler like you in my kingdom.

TEXT.English: God with you, my friend [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: God with you, my friend [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: Go! Go with God, but go, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: Go! Go with God, but go, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: Oh, it's you, [CT_NAME]. Did you postpone your weekly chat with the devil to talk to me?
TEXT.Chinese: Oh, it's you, [CT_NAME]. Did you postpone your weekly chat with the devil to talk to me?

TEXT.English: Even pagans like you can help the [OUR_EMPIRE] in times of need, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: Even pagans like you can help the [OUR_EMPIRE] in times of need, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: I have the divine right to demand this, [CT_NAME]. If you don't pay up, God has a steamy pile of heavenly wrath in store for you.
TEXT.Chinese: I have the divine right to demand this, [CT_NAME]. If you don't pay up, God has a steamy pile of heavenly wrath in store for you.

TEXT.English: Begad, give us what we want or you will know the wrath of God!
TEXT.Chinese: Begad, give us what we want or you will know the wrath of God!

TEXT.English: Welcome to this beautiful land, [CT_NAME]. I hope that you bring peace with you, for he who greets with a stick, will be answered with a club.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to this beautiful land, [CT_NAME]. I hope that you bring peace with you, for he who greets with a stick, will be answered with a club.

TEXT.English: Welcome to [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]! I hope to many years of peace and cooperation between the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] and [CT_CIV_ADJ] empires!
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to [OUR_CIV_SHORT], [CT_NAME]. I am [OUR_NAME]! I hope to many years of peace and cooperation between the [OUR_CIV_ADJ] and [CT_CIV_ADJ] empires!

TEXT.English: Welcome traveller. I am [OUR_NAME]. Do you have any books to contribute to my library?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome traveller. I am [OUR_NAME]. Do you have any books to contribute to my library?

TEXT.English: I won't change a single word with you, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: I won't change a single word with you, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: We have absolutely nothing to discuss, so go away before I lock you in some cell!
TEXT.Chinese: We have absolutely nothing to discuss, so go away before I lock you in some cell!

TEXT.English: No peace in this time between us!
TEXT.Chinese: No peace in this time between us!

TEXT.English: No way! We shall fight to the end!
TEXT.Chinese: No way! We shall fight to the end!

TEXT.English: Oh, szervusz, [CT_NAME]! Come, lets sit in the library and discuss the arts!
TEXT.Chinese: Oh, szervusz, [CT_NAME]! Come, lets sit in the library and discuss the arts!

TEXT.English: God with you, my friend [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: God with you, my friend [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: You dare to bother me, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: You dare to bother me, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: What, you again?!
TEXT.Chinese: What, you again?!

TEXT.English: I could use some good cheer, my friend [CT_NAME]. Such a gift would surely lift my spirits!
TEXT.Chinese: I could use some good cheer, my friend [CT_NAME]. Such a gift would surely lift my spirits!

TEXT.English: I would really appreciate if you donated to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Any chance for that at all?
TEXT.Chinese: I would really appreciate if you donated to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. Any chance for that at all?

TEXT.English: Friendship between peoples is built on the share of resources; don't you think so, [CT_NAME]?
TEXT.Chinese: Friendship between peoples is built on the share of resources; don't you think so, [CT_NAME]?

TEXT.English: You should try to keep me in humour, [CT_NAME].
TEXT.Chinese: You should try to keep me in humour, [CT_NAME].

TEXT.English: If you are a true friend you'll give me this!
TEXT.Chinese: If you are a true friend you'll give me this!

TEXT.English: Give me this, and my armies will go spill the blood of some other heathen on the ground.
TEXT.Chinese: Give me this, and my armies will go spill the blood of some other heathen on the ground.

TEXT.English: If you won't give me this I'll use my army to get it, so what do you prefer?
TEXT.Chinese: If you won't give me this I'll use my army to get it, so what do you prefer?

TEXT.English: Hello, I am [OUR_NAME], [OUR_CIV_ADJ] Emperor! You, [CT_NAME], are pleased to be in my presence!
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, I am [OUR_NAME], [OUR_CIV_ADJ] Emperor! You, [CT_NAME], are pleased to be in my presence!

TEXT.English: By my beard, your lands look easily conquered!
TEXT.Chinese: By my beard, your lands look easily conquered!

TEXT.English: We speak only when I say so!
TEXT.Chinese: We speak only when I say so!

TEXT.English: Your army cannot stop mine! You know I will win eventually! I'll make it into your capital even if it'll be inside a barrel!
TEXT.Chinese: Your army cannot stop mine! You know I will win eventually! I'll make it into your capital even if it'll be inside a barrel!

TEXT.English: [CT_NAME], come in! It is nice to have other great rulers in the world to talk to!
TEXT.Chinese: [CT_NAME], come in! It is nice to have other great rulers in the world to talk to!

TEXT.English: Make it quick, I have no time to waste on the likes of you!
TEXT.Chinese: Make it quick, I have no time to waste on the likes of you!

TEXT.English: I really need your aid, [CT_NAME]. You know you can trust me!
TEXT.Chinese: I really need your aid, [CT_NAME]. You know you can trust me!

TEXT.English: Lets put it like this: if you won't give us this don't count on me joining your crusades!
TEXT.Chinese: Lets put it like this: if you won't give us this don't count on me joining your crusades!

TEXT.English: The [OUR_EMPIRE] demands the following! I suggest you give it to us unless you like eating donkey droppings!
TEXT.Chinese: The [OUR_EMPIRE] demands the following! I suggest you give it to us unless you like eating donkey droppings!

TEXT.English: Peace be onto you, [CT_NAME]. I am the righteous [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. May there be peace betwen us for as long as we worship the same deity!
TEXT.Chinese: Peace be onto you, [CT_NAME]. I am the righteous [OUR_NAME] of the [OUR_EMPIRE]. May there be peace betwen us for as long as we worship the same deity!

TEXT.English: What you will need to understand, [CT_NAME], is that anyone who fights on behalf of Allah, when he dies, the first drop of blood that comes out, all of his sins will be forgiven.
TEXT.Chinese: What you will need to understand, [CT_NAME], is that anyone who fights on behalf of Allah, when he dies, the first drop of blood that comes out, all of his sins will be forgiven.

TEXT.English: Assalamu alaikum. Allah will help him who moves in the way of Allah.
TEXT.Chinese: Assalamu alaikum. Allah will help him who moves in the way of Allah.

TEXT.English: Silence! Or must I have your tongue cut out?
TEXT.Chinese: Silence! Or must I have your tongue cut out?

TEXT.English: Silence! I kill you!
TEXT.Chinese: Silence! I kill you!

TEXT.English: There will be no peace until you convert from your wicked ways.
TEXT.Chinese: There will be no peace until you convert from your wicked ways.

TEXT.English: You are my favorite infidel in the whole wide world, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: You are my favorite infidel in the whole wide world, [CT_NAME]!

TEXT.English: What is it now, you swine-eating drunkard?
TEXT.Chinese: What is it now, you swine-eating drunkard?

TEXT.English: Allah is watching you, [CT_NAME]. He would approve if you did this good deed.
TEXT.Chinese: Allah is watching you, [CT_NAME]. He would approve if you did this good deed.

TEXT.English: Allah is watching you, [CT_NAME]. He would really like if you did this good deed, you know.
TEXT.Chinese: Allah is watching you, [CT_NAME]. He would really like if you did this good deed, you know.

TEXT.English: If you give this to me, [CT_NAME], there might be 72 virgins waiting to greet you in the afterlife!
TEXT.Chinese: If you give this to me, [CT_NAME], there might be 72 virgins waiting to greet you in the afterlife!

TEXT.English: Mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT] will crush your kingdom of evil if you don't obey her commands!
TEXT.Chinese: Mighty [OUR_CIV_SHORT] will crush your kingdom of evil if you don't obey her commands!

TEXT.English: Welcome to the [OUR_EMPIRE], [CT_NAME]. I am the king, [OUR_NAME]. Would you like to become a friend of our kingdom? If you don't want to, then... it's been nice knowing you.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to the [OUR_EMPIRE], [CT_NAME]. I am the king, [OUR_NAME]. Would you like to become a friend of our kingdom? If you don't want to, then... it's been nice knowing you.

TEXT.English: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king, [OUR_NAME]. Will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome to the independent [OUR_CIV_ADJ] lands! I am the king, [OUR_NAME]. Will [CT_CIV_SHORT] recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s independence or do I need to convince you with my armies?

TEXT.English: Welcome, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Excuse my distance but birds of prey do not flock together.
TEXT.Chinese: Welcome, [CT_NAME] of the [CT_EMPIRE]. Excuse my distance but birds of prey do not flock together.

TEXT.English: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] shall be free, for God is on my side. Whose side are you on?
TEXT.Chinese: [OUR_CIV_SHORT] shall be free, for God is on my side. Whose side are you on?

TEXT.English: I thought we banished all your people from [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. What are you doing here?
TEXT.Chinese: I thought we banished all your people from [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. What are you doing here?

TEXT.English: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and I will not talk to you!
TEXT.Chinese: You are an enemy of [OUR_CIV_SHORT] and I will not talk to you!

TEXT.English: There will be no peace between us until you recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s sovereignity over her territory!
TEXT.Chinese: There will be no peace between us until you recognize [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s sovereignity over her territory!

TEXT.English: Take that peace treaty of yours and shove it!
TEXT.Chinese: Take that peace treaty of yours and shove it!

TEXT.English: Hey, if it isn't [CT_NAME], my greatest friend in the world! You want to hold my sword? Careful, it's heavy!
TEXT.Chinese: Hey, if it isn't [CT_NAME], my greatest friend in the world! You want to hold my sword? Careful, it's heavy!

TEXT.English: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Here comes my best friend, [CT_NAME]! What brings you today to [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: You know, I almost feel sorry for [CT_CIV_SHORT], having of all people you as their leader. What is it you want to talk about?
TEXT.Chinese: You know, I almost feel sorry for [CT_CIV_SHORT], having of all people you as their leader. What is it you want to talk about?

TEXT.English: Would you like to take part in this deal with [OUR_EMPIRE]? It's not like you have much choice anyway.
TEXT.Chinese: Would you like to take part in this deal with [OUR_EMPIRE]? It's not like you have much choice anyway.

TEXT.English: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?
TEXT.Chinese: Any chance you share your wealth with [OUR_CIV_SHORT]?

TEXT.English: We demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!
TEXT.Chinese: We demand your assistance, [CT_NAME]! [OUR_CIV_SHORT]'s future depends on you!

TEXT.English: If you don't give me this, you're asking me to engage you in personal combat. Believe me, that is not a good idea.
TEXT.Chinese: If you don't give me this, you're asking me to engage you in personal combat. Believe me, that is not a good idea.

TEXT.English: Hand this over, or I'll have to call ten men over here to bring me my sword!
TEXT.Chinese: Hand this over, or I'll have to call ten men over here to bring me my sword!

TEXT.English: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!
TEXT.Chinese: Recognizing me as king of the [OUR_EMPIRE] is not enough! I demand the following in tribute!

TEXT.English: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?
TEXT.Chinese: Hail and well met, [CT_NAME]! I am [OUR_NAME], ruler of the glorious [OUR_CIV_SHORT]. So tell me: does [CT_CIV_SHORT] have a lot of rich and unprotected coastal cities, or what?

TEXT.English: Greetings from the [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] of the ancient north! Shall we live in peace or do you wish to challenge us?
TEXT.Chinese: Greetings from the [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] of the ancient north! Shall we live in peace or do you wish to challenge us?

TEXT.English: Hail, [CT_NAME]! Do you follow the real warrior's way?
TEXT.Chinese: Hail, [CT_NAME]! Do you follow the real warrior's way?

TEXT.English: I don't wish to talk to you. To me you are just like those bandits I have slaughtered!
TEXT.Chinese: I don't wish to talk to you. To me you are just like those bandits I have slaughtered!

TEXT.English: There will be no peace between us! I've been planning on occupying your land a long time ago, and now I finally have the chance to do it! Don't spoil it for me!
TEXT.Chinese: There will be no peace between us! I've been planning on occupying your land a long time ago, and now I finally have the chance to do it! Don't spoil it for me!

TEXT.English: Hello, [CT_NAME]! Who's bothering you this time? I'll make them pay!
TEXT.Chinese: Hello, [CT_NAME]! Who's bothering you this time? I'll make them pay!

TEXT.English: Your crown is tempting, [CT_NAME], don't tempt me to take it by force.
TEXT.Chinese: Your crown is tempting, [CT_NAME], don't tempt me to take it by force.

TEXT.English: Speak, heathen fool!
TEXT.Chinese: Speak, heathen fool!

TEXT.English: I hate to disturb you, but I really need this!
TEXT.Chinese: I hate to disturb you, but I really need this!

TEXT.English: The [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] are strong and don't need anything from you... except for maybe this...
TEXT.Chinese: The [OUR_CIV_ADJ:1] are strong and don't need anything from you... except for maybe this...

TEXT.English: Give me this or we will go berserk on your country, [CT_NAME]!
TEXT.Chinese: Give me this or we will go berserk on your country, [CT_NAME]!
